events.message: I recently purchased a jacket but would like to request a refund because the size is incorrect and it does not fit me at all.
The customer's message indicates a refund request due to fitting issues, so the case is categorized under Refund.
Assigning this refund request to agent Jessica for further assistance and processing.
Hello! Thank you for reaching out. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request for the jacket.
Could you please provide your order number and confirm if the jacket is unused and in its original packaging for the refund process?
The order number is 987654321. The jacket is brand new, still with tags, and has not been worn or washed.
Thank you for the details. We have initiated your refund request. Please ship the jacket back using the prepaid label we will email to you shortly.
Thanks for your quick response and help. I appreciate the prepaid label for the return shipment.
We have received the returned jacket and processed the full refund to your original payment method. You should see the amount reflected soon.
Just following up to ensure you have received the refund and if there is anything else we can assist you with.
Since the refund has been successfully completed and no further concerns were raised, we are closing this support case. Thank you for contacting us.
